title: Storybook: fix broken pages
body:
# Bug Report

## Description

Some pages are not compiling bc of changes in some related areas.

Pages can be verified automatically by running `PagesValidator` target crated here: https://github.com/status-im/status-desktop/pull/12284

When all pages are fixed, CI check will be added: https://github.com/status-im/status-desktop/issues/12213

```
"AboutViewPage.qml"
"AccountViewPage.qml"
"ActivityFilterMenuPage.qml"
(file:///home/michalc/workspace/status-desktop/storybook/pages/ActivityFilterMenuPage.qml:85:30: Invalid property assignment: "savedAddressesModel" is a read-only property
            savedAddressesModel: d.recipeintModel.savedAddresses
                                 ^)
```
